bibl.title: Imperial Estates in Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: Parássoglou George M., Imperial Estates in Roman Egypt. (American Studies in Papyrology. 18.)
Amsterdam, A.M. Hakkert, 1978, 4°, viii-117 pp., 1 carte.

C.R. par W. Lackner, AnzAW 35 (1982) coll. 266-267. - G. Nachtergael, AntCl 52 (1983) pp. 445-446. - J. Schwartz, REA 83 (1981) p. 126. - G. Husson, REG 94 (1981) pp. 244-245. - J.A. Straus, Latomus 41 (1982) pp. 384-386. - D.J. Crawford, CR N.S., 30 (1980) pp. 251-253. - D. Hagedorn, Ellenika 31 (1979) pp. 514-517. - J. Hengstl, Gnomon 53 (1981) pp. 37-41.
